meanings.definition: The side or part of something that is farthest away from the observer.
meanings.sent1: From the farside of the field, the mountains looked small.
meanings.sent2: She preferred sitting on the farside of the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The cat always hides on the farside of the garden to surprise the birds.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts wandered to the farside of reality, where dreams take flight.
meanings.sent5: The farside of the moon remained a mystery for centuries.

meanings.definition: A comic strip created by Gary Larson.
meanings.sent1: The farside comic made everyone in the office laugh.
meanings.sent2: She collected every farside book released.
meanings.sent3: The farside characters had a hilarious adventure in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: His humor was as unique as a farside cartoon.
meanings.sent5: The farside comics always brought a smile to her face.
